text: Data was collected through in - depth individual interviews . All participants who signed a written consent form before data collection were included in this study and were interviewed . The researcher explained the purpose of the study to each participant before interviewing them . Participants were assured that confidentiality will be maintained . The interview dates and times were arranged with participants prior to data collection date . Data collection took place between April - July 2015 . The interviews were conducted early in the morning as suggested by participants before they could start with their duties to avoid distracting them from their normal ward routine work . Separate interviews with six participants took place in a private office within TB wards at the regional hospital , and each lasted approximately 30 min . All interviews were conducted by the researcher . All interviews started with an opening question : " What is your experience when nursing patients who suffer from TB ? "
